attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years now our country has been slowly taken over by politictians and beraucrats who have no interest in making our country good for the English. We have slowly been taken over by equal rights campaigns (none of which take the rights of the ENGLISH citizen into mind) and now we see immigrants (MANY ILLEGAL) recieving a better Support from the state than those ENGLISH citizens who were born here and have many generations before them.

Isnt it time that England looked after number 1?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
